root.name: Big Nose the Caveman
root.description: OverviewIn this prehistoric themed platformer, accompanied by memorable music, player takes a role of a caveman. Equipped with just a club the man in question visits various parts of prehistoric earth killing unusually aggressive animals and plants. The game features power-ups, like a stone-throwing club and other modifications which are mostly available at shops appearing every third level. These are bought by bones, collected by jumping, entering hidden passages or from killing enemies.Player will visit desert, forest, jungle and snow themed levels and also a flying stage where Caveman must attack birds with the same club that he spins above his head to keep him in the air. Every level features a boss.
